events.name: Aston Villa at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Danny Ings scored twice as Aston Villa continued their fine start under Unai Emery by coming from behind to win 2-1 at Brighton on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Villa's resurgence continues with win at Brighton

headlines.description: Alejandro Garnacho's late winner saw Man United defeat Fulham 2-1 in their last match before the World Cup break at Craven Cottage on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Garnacho nets last-gasp winner for Man United
